entry.title: Pradumnasaraf/open-source-with-pradumna
entry.summary:
Open Source guide - Contains resources and materials to learn and get yourself started with Open Source, Git, and GitHub.

"Building the repo you need to get started with Open Source"

Repo Navigation

This repo contains resources and materials to learn and get yourself started with Open Source, Git, and GitHub.

The repo content is divided into several Pages for better structuring, easy navigation and making the learning easy.

For Eg: There is a separate page for Resources and Bootcamp.

This repo is hosted at oswp.study


Follow @Pradumna_saraf on Twitter to learn more about it.


Table of Pages

Section/pages Description Page (Link- clickable)
It contains 15 days of Twitter threads and blogs that I posted during the Bootcamp.
Contains step by step (Written + Screenshot + Video) on how to create an Issues,fork, etc
Other Resources like Video, Blog and images, to learn Open Source, Git, and Github
Contains repo link for Beginner friendly projects
Informational content, that I and other community people post.
Commonly asked questions related to Open Source, Git, and GitHub.

Don't forget to â­ this repo

Building with the COMMUNITY for the COMMUNITY â¤ï¸
